code: import CartActionTypes from"./cart.types";export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:CartActionTypes.TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItems=function addItems(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.ADD_ITEMS,payload:item};};export var clearItemFromCart=function clearItemFromCart(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.CLEAR_ITEMS_FROM_CART,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clearCart=function clearCart(){return{type:CartActionTypes.CLEAR_CART};};
